企业简介

Company
Profile

重庆海领实业有限公司（简称“海领”，英文HAILING）成立于2008年，注册资本1.5亿元，位于中国（重庆）自由贸易试验区 · 两江新区 · 保税港空港。

Chongqing Hailing Industrial Co., Ltd. (abbreviated as “Hailing”, or HAILING) was established in 2008 with a registered capital of 150 million yuan. It is located in the China (Chongqing) Pilot Free Trade Zone. Liangjiang New Area. Free Trade Port.
